pr_title: Fix a bug where gRPC server throws NPE when a call is closed by ServerInterceptor

timeline.message:
Fix a bug gRPC server throws NPE when a call is closed by ServerInterceptor

Motivation:

When a gRPC request is closed by ServerInterceptor while starting a call,
ArmeriaServerCall throws NullPointerException.

This is caused by `listener` is null. `listener` is not initialized when `call.close()` is called.
https://github.com/line/armeria/blob/8a1281f1d2b827f516247b8f9eb6210f2a047efa/grpc/src/main/java/com/linecorp/armeria/server/grpc/ArmeriaServerCall.java#L492-L495
`listener` will be set by the returned value of `startCall(call, metadata)`.
https://github.com/line/armeria/blob/a16e2c0254c030989d372cf22b01c9433697fabf/grpc/src/main/java/com/linecorp/armeria/server/grpc/FramedGrpcService.java#L238

@okue was reported the issue. https://github.com/line/armeria/issues/2607#issuecomment-682036344

Modifications:

- Check nullity where `listener` could be null.

Result:

Armeria gRPC server does not raise `NullPointerException` anymore when a gRPC server interceptor close a call.
